introduction: SYNOPSISYoon-kyung has lived her life yearning for her mother who passed away when she was a child. She feels sorry for her father who spent a good part of his life doing everything he could to provide her with a good life. When traces of harmful mercury is found in the cosmetics manufactured by the company her father gave his life to, their lives are jeopardized. After numerous court appearances and testimonies, he is found guilty and imprisoned. Yoon-kyung loses complete faith in life and quits school out of despair. She starts to work as a room nightclub hostess. Meanwhile Sung-hyun watches helplessly waiting for the day that she comes back to her old happy and cheerful self.故事小姐的母亲，谁死的早，父邓恩海州黄昏的温馨的爱情dwitbaraji不会耗尽如果yungyeongeun发送给她的童年，每个人都应该伤害。有一天，我爸爸事故有害于人体检测从专用于混合发生ohdeon经营的公司制造的化妆品汞含量。公司正处于破产危机之中，经过多次审判，父亲终于被关进监狱。成为悲观谁大大难过yungyeongeun生活本身父亲的工作，它变得停止最后一间酒吧女招待之前上学。宋贤为这样的辉煌和希望，她会回到她以前的光明欢快的外表而感到难过。
